item.description:
Come join our elves for hot apple cider and sweet treats as we raise donations for Toys-for-Tots of Boston. We will be reading various Dr. Seuss books from 11-12:30 and ask participants to bring either one unwrapped gift for our toy drive or a $5 donation per family for the cause!

Come spread some holiday cheer!

We are also holding a food drive for the Greater Boston Foodbank until Thursday Dec 15th so if you want to participate just contact us and we will be happy to schedule a drop-off or pick-up!

group.name: Practical Philosophy -- Application of Timeless Wisdom

item.name: Dr. Seuss does the Holidays: book reading
